events.name: CampaignCreated
events.description: Triggered when a new marketing campaign is initiated.

events.name: CampaignLaunched
events.description: Indicates that a marketing campaign has officially started.

events.name: CampaignEnded
events.description: Represents the completion of a marketing campaign.

events.name: AudienceEngaged
events.description: When a targeted audience interacts with campaign content.

events.name: AdPerformanceMeasured
events.description: To analyze the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.

commands.name: CreateCampaign
commands.description: Triggered when a new marketing campaign is initiated.

commands.name: LaunchCampaign
commands.description: Indicates that a marketing campaign has officially started.

commands.name: EndCampaign
commands.description: Represents the completion of a marketing campaign.

commands.name: EngageAudience
commands.description: When a targeted audience interacts with campaign content.

commands.name: MeasureAdPerformance
commands.description: To analyze the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.

integrationPoints.name: Analytics
integrationPoints.description: To integrate with an analytics system for tracking campaign performance.

integrationPoints.name: CRM
integrationPoints.description: To sync audience engagement data with the customer relationship management system.

integrationPoints.name: ECommerce
integrationPoints.description: To connect marketing campaigns with the eCommerce platform for better product targeting.
